alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 9:42PM CST until December 28 at 1:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Pearl River Near Bogalusa affecting Hancock, Pearl River, St. Tammany and Washington Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Pearl River Near Pearl River affecting Hancock, St. Tammany and Pearl River Counties. For the Lower Pearl River...including Bogalusa, Pearl River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 28... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Bogalusa. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, December 28. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Woodlands and crop acreage along the river will be flooded. The Bogue Chitto Wildlife Management area will be inundated with water in recreational camps and over access roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CST Monday was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, December 27. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.7 feet on 11/01/1985. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
